sentences.english: And danced in triumph o'er the waters wide.
sentences.chinese: 而又在廣闊的海洋上驕矜地舞蹈過。

sentences.english: I like summer, but it is too proud.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡夏天，可它過於驕矜。

sentences.english: Hehas ppowericularly efficient young man though just some proud.
sentences.chinese: 他是個很有才氣的人，但是有點驕矜。

sentences.english: I ought to be chief, " said Jack with simple arrogance ."
Or the vaunted glory and growth of the great city spread around me?
sentences.chinese: 或者是在我周圍蔓延的大城市的驕矜壯麗和發展？

definition: Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
to fool the world and usurp a good name (idiom)
